status: Strawberry Marshmallow ; 苺ましまろ ; Ichigo Marshmallow ; 草莓棉花糖 ; 莓乱扔 ; Les petites fraises ; Erdbeeren & Marshmallows ; 딸기 마시마로
description:
Description :
        "Cute girls doing cute things in cute ways." Everyday things make up the fabric of life, whether it's making friends, going to school, trying to make money, or celebrating a holiday. Ichigo Mashimaro follows the antics and daily lives of Chika Itoh, her sister Nobue, and her friends Miu, Matsuri, and Ana.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 1: The Heartbreak Trip To Izu
